entry.title: 3AC Liquidation, Celsius Layoffs, Voyager Freezes but BlockFi Strikes a Deal
entry.summary: Is it over? Is this the future? Sadly, the answer, is no. The catastrophic fallout of the UST collapse continues as Voyager, Celsius, BlockFi, 3AC and SBF dominated headlines once again last week. All the latest from this opera of rektitude.

entry.title: Ethereum Difficulty Bomb Delayed to Mid-September
entry.summary: The Merge is set to be delayed by at least three months.

entry.title: Inbox Dump
entry.summary: Look at this as the starting point to DYOR.

entry.title: Polygon and Fantom Services Restored After Phishing Attack
entry.summary: Blockchain networks Polygon and Fantom suffered a DNS attack Friday that directed users to malicious websites created to steal the keys to their digital wallets.

entry.title: Crypto Broker Voyager Suspends Withdrawals and Trading After 3AC’s Loan Default
entry.summary: Voyager, a crypto broker, has suspended withdrawals, trading, deposits and loyalty rewards from its app following Three Arrows Capital’s default on its loan.
